enableMusicButton: Enable button to play Kingdom songs on shuffle
mediaSaveFolder: Folder in which to save media
noDocumentsFound: No media was found in any of the chosen JWPUB's documents. Please validate the file or contact the developer of this app.
selectDocument: Select a document for which to extract media:
selectExternalMedia: These referenced media files are not included in the JWPUB file. Please click on each one to locate it on your computer:
syncOnLaunch: Initiate media sync on app launch
whatsNewDetails:
Notable changes:

  • A few free cloud hosting providers were added to the congregation media syncing setup screen, now making it easier than ever to enable this useful feature; give it a try!
  • Syncing media will no longer wipe the current week's folders, unless congregation media syncing is enabled
  • SVG files are now better rendered

Issues fixed:

  • Importing media from older JWPUB files didn't work as expected
  • JPG image orientation wasn't taken into consideration properly
  • Many minor bugfixes and under-the-hood improvements

Enjoy!
